title: How to Make a Stand Up Straight Juice

steps.headline: Chop the watermelon into small pieces and add it to the blender.
Hull the strawberries (take the tops off) and cut them into slices.
steps.description: Add the pieces to the blender.

steps.headline: Pour the tincture into the blender.
Blend for about 15 to 20 seconds or until everything is well blended.

text: Chop the watermelon into small pieces and add it to the blender.  Hull the strawberries (take the tops off) and cut them into slices. Add the pieces to the blender. Pour the tincture into the blender.  Blend for about 15 to 20 seconds or until everything is well blended.  Serve into a glass.  Finished.
